subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s/k-niŋ||heart; brain; mind}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}; STEDT). Cognate with {{cog|nmf|ning||mind}}, {{cog|mni|tr=puk '''ning'''|t=heart; mind}}, {{cog|kfk|tr=stiŋ|t=heart}}, {{cog|grt|taning||brain}}, {{cog|acn|nhaiqlom|'''nhaiq'''lom|heart}}, {{cog|bzi|tr=nɯŋ ba|t=heart}}. Possibly related to {{cog|bo|ཉིང||pith, essence}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

For a parallel semantic development, compare {{cog|bo|སྙིང་རྗེ||compassion; kindness; mercy}}, from {{cog|bo|སྙིང||heart; mind}}.
